bg.description: The player(s) of your choice will earn you 2x the BHC for every goal they score.
bg.title: 2x Goals

bh.description: The player(s) of your choice will earn you 2x the BHC for every crushing hit they deliver.
bh.title: 2x Hits

bs.description: The player(s) of your choice will earn you 2x the BHC for every save. Only available to goalies!
bs.title: 2x Saves

ba.description: The player(s) of your choice will earn you 2x the BHC for every assist they record.
ba.title: 2x Assists

bw.description: The player(s) of your choice will earn you 2x the BHC for every assist they record.
bw.title: 2x Win Bonus

bn.description: The player(s) of your choice are immune to minuses when a goal is allowed during their shift on the ice.
bn.title: No Subtraction of Point
